item.description:
Just gonna have a few members over for a movie night. I don't care what movie but Iwould love to watch Louis Black - Red, White & Screwed. Funny Funny stuff !!!

Bennaye will be making the popcorn !!! I will have some apps - byob and all cookies and cake must leave with you !!
item.how_to_find_us: It's My house - I hope that is not an issue....

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Movie Night at Roger's House
